DOC.brief_summary: This large prospective multi-center cohort study aim identify patient 's characteristic significantly influence ovarian response mild stimulation fix dose 75 IU recombinant FSH .
DOC.brief_title: Predicting Ovarian Response Artificial Insemination With Low Stimulation
DOC.detailed_description: A multi-center , open-label , prospective cohort study . Patients regular indication COH/IUI ( control ovarian stimulation/ intra uterine insemination ) ask participate . Patient 's characteristic document include age , weight , BMI , smoke status , cycle day 2 3 4 FSH /Estradiol level , antral follicle count , AMH . AMH FSH/Estradiol determine centrally completion inclusion patient study . All patient receive fix 75 IU recFSH per day conform normal stimulation protocol start cycle day 3 , 4 5 exclusion ovarian cyst ultrasound . Ovarian response document ultrasound . Once dominant follicle ( ) reach mean diameter 16-18 mm , hCG ( 5000IU 250 mcg ) apply insemination schedule 36-42 hour later . Cancellation criterion define accord national guideline provide NVOG ( 7 ) .
DOC.criteria: couple unexplained mild male subfertility ( 13 ) spontaneous chance conception 40 % ( Hunault score ) . Unexplained subfertility include minimal mild endometriosis ( AFS grade 1 2 ) define failure conceive least one year unprotected intercourse whereas standard fertility workup unable detect factor might influence fertility negatively . semen analysis normal accord WHO guideline ( 8 ) , ovulation document ( BBT chart , ovulation detection ultrasound normal luteal progesterone value ) , tubal patency confirm ( HSG , laparoscopy fertiloscopy ) postcoital test perform cervical factor exclude . Mild male subfertility define abnormal semen parameter accord WHO ( 8 ) average total motile sperm account process least 10 million . Hunault score â‰¥ 40 % Endometriosis AFS grade 3 4 Contraindications use gonadotrophin ( cyst large 2 cm , allergy gonadotrophin ) Total motile sperm count sperm process 1 million Women age young eighteen year older 45 year . Previous treatment COH/IUI treat current subfertility Unable speak read Dutch language
